attributes.action: Spain give Ceuta back to the free people of Morocco
attributes.additional_details: Spain are trying to force the British Government to give them back Gibraltar even though the people there do not want to be ruled by Spain. Spain are contemplating signing an agreement with Argentina in a joint pact in support for Argentinas right over the Falkland Islands. With this the British Government should sign an agreement with Moroccan Government to help give Ceuta back to the free Moroccan people from their colonial rulers.
